author: Reuters
title: Apple releases budget iPhone SE priced at $399 as coronavirus stalls economy
description: The SE comes with a 4.7-inch display and the same processor chip as Apple's most advanced phone, the 11 Pro
content:
Apple Inc on Wednesday released a smaller iPhone priced at US$399, cutting the starting price for the company’s smartphone line in a move to broaden its appeal to budget-conscious customers as the coronavirus hobbles the global economy.
The lower-cost model … [+3376 chars]
